channel.title: LLM on Aman Ahuja

item.title: Advisor and LLM Expert for a Global Data Lab and Product Studio
item.description:
In 2024, Fenris began a new engagement with the World Resources Institute (WRI). WRI is an organization we’ve long admired, as home to several of the world’s most important data products in the service of climate action and human well-being. This significant client relationship demonstrates Fenris’s recognition as an expert in both data product strategy and generative AI technologies.

We are proud and very excited to be partnering with the Data Lab at WRI, which operates to support teams across the organization. The Data Lab also runs a product studio, helping WRI teams develop new infrastructure, improve features, and incubate new data products. Our collaboration focuses on strengthening their product and AI innovation capacity.
